title: The best wireless earbuds under $100 (2020)
description: The wireless earbuds market is huge and there are plenty of options that wont put you out of too much cash yet still deliver that cordless life with touch controls and great audio. So Becca Farsace got her hands on seven pairs of wireless earbuds from JLab, Skullcandy, 1More, OnePlus, and JBL to see which is the best option under $100.  If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics policy:   Skullcandy Sesh Evo (Amazon) -  Skullcandy Indy Evo (Amazon) -  OnePlus Buds (Amazon) -  OnePlus Buds Z (OnePlus) -  1MORE Piston Buds (1MORE) -  JBL Tune 215TWS (JBL) -  JLab Epic Air ANC (JLab) -   How Becca tests and reviews wireless earbuds:   Beccas Spotify playlist -   Timestamps: 0:00 Intro 0:45 Dope beats 0:52 What makes a good wireless earbud? 1:40 Mic Test / Earbud lineup 2:20 How Becca tests earbuds 2:45 OnePlus Buds Z 4:42 Skullcandy Indy Evo 7:01 JLab Epic Air ANC 9:15 The best wireless buds under $100 9:40 Conclusion  Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:   Why'd You Push That Button Podcast:  The Vergecast Podcast:  More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   Subscribe to Verge Science on YouTube, a new home base for our explorations into the future of science:
